resources.string: Welcome! This app lets you change the language and recordings associated with your BWT. Swipe down to select. Swipe up to go back. Swipe left or right to change options. Shake the phone at any time for help.
This screen has four quadrants. Top left is one, top right is two, bottom left is three, and bottom right is four. Please enter your password.
Tap and hold to begin recording xxx. Release when you are done. Swipe down to save your recording or swipe up to cancel. Swipe right to record the next item.
Please select a xxx to record.
Please tap and hold to record xxx.
This app lets you change the language and recordings associated with your BWT. Swipe down to select. Swipe up to go back. Swipe left or right to change options.
This screen has four quadrants. Top left is one, top right is two, bottom left is three, and bottom right is four. If you forgot your password, please contact a Tech Bridge World assistant.
Your menu options are Record Sounds and Settings. Your current selection is xxx. Swipe down to select.
Your language options are English, Kannada, and Hindi. Your current selection is xxx. Swipe down to select.
Your category options are Numbers, Letters, and Phrases. Your current selection is xxx in the language yyy. Swipe down to select.
Your recording options are zzz in the language yyy. Your current selection is xxx. Tap to hear the current recording or swipe down to select.
Tap and hold to begin recording xxx. Release when you are done. Swipe down to save your recording or swipe up to cancel. Swipe right to record the next item.
Please rotate the phone 90 degrees to the right.
Please rotate the phone 90 degrees to the left.
